title: Intergenerational Learning Characteristics Analysis and Customized Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Expertise in Scientific Fields and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Customized collaborative learning design for workers aged 40+ that accounts for generational learning differences.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze generational cognitive/behavioral characteristics and apply them to science education design.
Learners can design collaborative learning environments using customized technological tools.
Learners can improve learning strategies based on formative assessment data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
